name: Ookami Mio 大神ミオ / Hololive
description:
weight 0.8 is best.

I created this LoRA as requested.

Please read the description.

outfit1
miosha1, hair ornament, wolf tail, red choker, black shirt, sailor collar, detached sleeves, black skirt, pleated skirt, white thighhighs, midriff, bell, rope

outfit2 (jacket and shorts removable)
miosha1, hair ornament, ponytail, wolf tail, swimsuit, white shorts, thigh strap, black jacket, leaf print, collar, string bikini

outfit3
miosha1, hair ornament, wolf tail, black choker, hood, black hoodie, white hoodie, paw print, black shorts, black pantyhose

outfit4 (Beret and cardigan removable)
miosha1, hairclip, side braid, ponytail, hat, beret, wolf tail, black skirt, white shirt, necklace, sleeveless shirt, cardigan

outfit5
miosha1, hair flower, twintails, hair over one eye, wolf tail, elbow gloves, playing card, pantyhose, puffy sleeves, corset, choker, two-tone dress

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.
